Oleksandr Usyk cemented his status as the outstanding heavyweight of his generation with an emphatic fifth-round knockout of Daniel Dubois in their undisputed world title bout at London's Wembley Stadium on Saturday.Usyk, now a two-time undisputed champion, dominated the opening four rounds.

This victory marks Dubois' second defeat to Usyk in two years.
